title: Mods, you picked the wrong people :)
body:
Jikker was the only good pick for GD ambassador 

lets see: 

Tundra Fizz barely posts unless its about FEK 

Silent night Sona barely posts at all 

Evangele barely posts and doesn't realize that forums highlight your posts, so (s)he posts {{champion:267}} after every post

nice job picking people that don't fucking interact with forums ever XDDD
